includedAssets.title: Meet The Parents
includedAssets.synopsis: You only get one chance to create a good first impression and Ben Stiller's hapless Greg Focker blows it over one hellish weekend with his girlfriend's dad Robert De Niro. Nerves are to be expected, but it doesn't help that Pops is an ex-CIA spook whose suspiciousness borders on paranoia. Ben 'n' Bob's chalk-and-cheese act and moments of brilliantly executed slapstick made this an instant comedy classic.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Comedy starring Ben Stiller as the doomed groom who can't do anything right when he meets his fiancee's intimidating dad Robert De Niro.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: You only get one chance to create a good first impression and Ben Stiller's hapless Greg Focker blows it over one hellish weekend with his girlfriend's dad Robert De Niro. Nerves are to be expected, but it doesn't help that Pops is an ex-CIA spook whose suspiciousness borders on paranoia. Ben 'n' Bob's chalk-and-cheese act and moments of brilliantly executed slapstick made this an instant comedy classic.

includedAssets.title: Meet The Fockers
includedAssets.synopsis: Ben Stiller stars as the son-in-law who has to present his loopy parents Dustin Hoffman and Barbra Streisand to grumpy Robert De Niro.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Ben Stiller stars as the son-in-law who has to present his loopy parents Dustin Hoffman and Barbra Streisand to grumpy Robert De Niro.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Ben Stiller stars as the son-in-law who has to present his loopy parents Dustin Hoffman and Barbra Streisand to grumpy Robert De Niro.

includedAssets.title: Little Fockers
includedAssets.synopsis: Hapless Ben Stiller is tormented by formidable father-in-law Robert De Niro in this mischievous comedy sequel. Co-starring Dustin Hoffman, Owen Wilson and Jessica Alba.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Stiller and De Niro reunite for a third dose of Focker family fun, also starring Jessica Alba.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Hapless Ben Stiller is tormented by formidable father-in-law Robert De Niro in this mischievous comedy sequel. Co-starring Dustin Hoffman, Owen Wilson and Jessica Alba.

includedAssets.title: Meet The Parents Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: Ben Stiller's Greg Focker deals with meeting the father-in-law from hell (Robert De Niro), introducing his new family to his embarrassing parents (Dustin Hoffman and Barbra Streisand) and trying to raise twins under their grandpa's watchful eye. Hit comedy trilogy with Owen Wilson and Jessica Alba.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Ben Stiller deals with father-in-law from hell Robert De Niro and embarrassing parents Dustin Hoffman and Barbra Streisand in this hit comedy trilogy.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Ben Stiller's Greg Focker deals with meeting the father-in-law from hell (Robert De Niro), introducing his new family to his embarrassing parents (Dustin Hoffman and Barbra Streisand) and trying to raise twins under their grandpa's watchful eye. Hit comedy trilogy with Owen Wilson and Jessica Alba.

includedIn.title: Meet the Parents
includedIn.synopsis: Greg Focker tries to make a good first impression with his ex-CIA father-in-law during a weekend away, before introducing him to his embarrassing parents and attempting to raise twins under their Grandpa's watchful eye.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Calamity-prone Greg Focker tries his best to impress his ex-CIA father-in-law and cope with his embarrassing parents
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Greg Focker tries to make a good first impression with his ex-CIA father-in-law during a weekend away, before introducing him to his embarrassing parents and attempting to raise twins under their Grandpa's watchful eye.
